title: Clinical Requirements
cleaned_text: Clinical Education Requirements Immunizations and Physical Exam Students in the Doctor of Physical Therapy program are required to have the following vaccinations and an annual physical exam, influenza vaccination, TB test, and COVID-19 vaccination. - Hepatitis B (postive titer) - Influenza (flu) - Measles, Mumps, Accellular Pertussis (Tdap) - Varicella (or proof of immunity via IgG titer) - COVID-19 vaccination Please download the form below, collect your vaccination records, and visit your doctor of the required physical exam and titers (form must be signed by MD or CNP). Please bring this document and your vaccination records to orientation.
